import React from 'react' import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap/lib/navbar' import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap/lib/tab' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap/lib/inputgroup' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function SigninScreen() { const {search} = useLocation() const redirectInUrl = new URLSearchParams(search).get('redirect'); const redirect = redirectInUrl ? redirectInUrl : '/'; return ( Sign In
